definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: It did my heart good to hear about your promotion to Vice President of the agency.
sentences.chinese: 得知你提升爲經銷處副總經理，我心裏特別高興。

sentences.english: We must appoint a new teacher soon.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一位總經理，他應當任人爲賢。

sentences.english: Assistant General Manager of a five-star hotel in Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 深圳某五星級酒店總經理助理。

sentences.english: The prospect of bankruptcy of his company beetled over the general manager.
sentences.chinese: 總經理面臨他的公司破產的陰暗前景。

sentences.english: If Financial Manager, the procedures will be done with the supervision of General Manager.
sentences.chinese: 財務經理交接工作時，要在總經理的監督下進行。

sentences.english: Mr. Jiang is currently Managing Director of the Investment Banking Department.
sentences.chinese: 蔣興權先生現爲中金公司投資銀行部董事總經理。

sentences.english: If any debt becomes overdue, inform the branch head immediately.
sentences.chinese: 如遇應收賬款逾期未到帳，立即告知知分公司總經理。

sentences.english: Mr. Bu Deyin, Deputy Director, Economic Forecasting Department, State Information Center.
sentences.chinese: 德國科隆展覽中國有限公司董事總經理馮向軍先生。

sentences.english: Managing Director and Partner, AsiaTech Management LLC.
sentences.chinese: 董事總經理，合夥人，治平投資。

sentences.english: Hui hai behaved calm after listen to, but also to his nephew and general manager of MingWei lectured.
sentences.chinese: 匯海聽後表現鎮定，還向其侄兒兼總經理明威訓話。

sentences.english: Xiao Zhimei served as the general manager of the high champion supermarket, wasteful spending.
sentences.chinese: 蕭芝媚擔任高爾佳超市的總經理後，大手大腳花錢。

sentences.english: Yanzhou Mining Group Vice President Zhang Minglin chair will be assessed.
sentences.chinese: 兗礦集團副總經理張鳴林主持評審會。

sentences.english: I'm deputy managing director of the Sino-AmericanPharmaceutical Co. Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 我是中美製藥有限公司的副總經理。

sentences.english: Our general manager, Mr. Liu's idea is the best.
sentences.chinese: 我們劉總經理提出的設想最好。

sentences.english: He is currently a deputy general manager of BNS Group Company.
sentences.chinese: 出任北辰集團公司副總經理。

sentences.english: Assistant to the General Manager of Shenzhen Petrochemical Industrial Corporation Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 深圳石油化工集團股份無限公司總經理助理。

definition: head/director (of an organizational unit)/(police) commissioner/inspector-general/rank of local governor in Tang dynasty administration
vice-chairman (of an organization)/vice president (of a company)/deputy governor (of a bank)
president of a club, committee etc
